name: June
description: In fact, there is too much stress in the Chinese traditional lunar calendar. Because China has a long history and there are many myths and legends, our ancestors stipulated the taboos in these twelve months through these and the fates and bad luck that we don't know. In China, the most popular expression is July, and the legend of this kind of folk spirits is most popular. It is also called Yin and Yang. It is the Yin of the Yin and Yang. So, in the past twelve months, the Chinese folk "Yin Yin Yang", "sacrifice", "tradition", "ghosts" and "gods" have been painted for twelve months.
